chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: AeonBuild is a configuration management tool designed to easily manage even the most complex software stacks.

In order to use AeonBuild, you just need to create a script defining resources (which can represent any elements of a software stack ie: an application, a server, etc), and use the AeonBuild command line tool which will perform any required tasks to setup the infrastructure.
Some of the main features of AeonBuild are:

listitem.para: Has a very powerful and flexible engine designed to easily handle complex enterprise applications.
Support to various languages including it's own declarative language (DSL), Java and a large number of scripting languages like Ruby, Python, Javascript and many others.
Can manage remote servers using SSH (thus without requiring an agent to be deployed on the server).
Automatically creates and manages credentials and cryptographic keys/certificates.
